name: shaftlog
description: Secure, highly available, and fault tolerant log transport

scripts.prepublish: ./node_modules/.bin/_node -c lib && (echo '#!/usr/bin/env node'; ./node_modules/.bin/browserify --bare --dg false ./lib/clie.js) > shaftlog-client.js && (echo '#!/usr/bin/env node'; ./node_modules/.bin/browserify --bare --dg false ./lib/serv.js) > shaftlog-server.js
